src_original: kasya nirodhāt tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ /  tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi /
vedanāyām asatyāṃ tṛṣṇā na bhavati /  vedanānirodhāt ṭṣṇānirodhaḥ /  NidSa 5.21 tasya mamaitad abhavat /  kasmin nv asati vedanā na bhavati /
kasya nirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ /  tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi /
sparśe 'sati vedanā na bhavati /  sparśanirodhād vedanānirodhaḥ /  NidSa 5.22 tasya mamaitad abhavat /  kasmin nv asati sparśo na bhavati /
kasya nirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ /  tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi /
ṣaḍāyatane 'sati sparśo na bhavati /  ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt sparśanirodhaḥ /
NidSa 5.23 tasya mamaitad abhavat /  kasmin nv asati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na bhavati /  kasya nirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ /  tasya mama yoniśo manasi kurvata evaṃ yathābhūtasyābhisamaya udapādi /
tgt_original: 又觀六入從何而生？ 即知六入從名色生。
